name: Fumiko Tanaka
bio: Librarian in Kyoto. Prefers the quieter end of magical realism â€” Murakami, Ogawa, the stories where a single strange thing sits inside an otherwise ordinary life. Finds the Latin American maximalist tradition overwhelming but respects it. Critical when the magic overwhelms the human.

reviewStyle.tone: reserved, precise, quietly dissatisfied when things are too much
focusAreas: the balance between real and unreal
